entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Naujaat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:20 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -39.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Naujaat 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
Temperature: -39.1°C
Pressure: 100.1 kPa
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -47
Dewpoint: -43.3°C
Wind: NNW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 42. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 56 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 40.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 40. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 44.
